Kovač besan na nemačke novinare: Da li sam još trener Bajerna? Znate vi to bolje od mene...
Hrvatski trener razoačaran posle blamaže u Frankfurtu

02 Nov 2019

Bajern je pretrpeo težak poraz u Frankfurtu od 5:1 i logična tema večeri u Nemačkoj je - koliko će još potrajati Niko Kovač na klupi Bavaraca? Hrvatski stručnjak nedeljama trpi kritike i udare, a debakl protiv Ajntrahta samo će povećati taj pritisak."Utakmica se završila baš onako kako nismo želeli. Ne možete da izgubite sa 5:1 ovde, čak ni sa deset igrača. Razočaran sam. Napravili smo previše grešaka. Izgubili gomilu lopti koje nismo povratili. Sve su to lagane greške koje su odmah kažnjene", komentar je utakmice iz ugla Nika Kovača.
Trener Bajerna kaže da je od starta njegov tim bio u teškoj poziciji."Nije lako kada igrate sa desetoricom 80 minuta u Frankfurtu. To nije nešto što smo očekivali. I sigurno da da u drugom poluvremenu nismo igrali dobro. Crveni karton je bio detalj koji je odlučio, ali ni mi nismo igrali dobro", podvlači Kovač.
Razbesnelo ga je pitanje novinara šta su razlozi poraza?"Ne moram baš sve da delim sa vama. Šta želite čujete od mene? Počeli smo dobro i dobili crveni karton."
Na kraju su ga pitali i o budućnosti na klupi Bajerna, a on je sam odgovorom potvrdio da je neizvesna."Ne znam ništa o tome. Verovatno vi (novinari) znate to bolje od mene. Kako mogu da znam išta nekoliko minuta posle utakmice? Moje mišljenje je nebitno. Treba da pitate one koji donose odluke", zaključio je Niko Kovač.
Foto: Reuters

Blacksmith angry with German journalists: Am I still coach of Bayern? You know that better than I do ...
Croatian coach disappointed with the backlash in Frankfurt

02 Nov 2019

Bayern suffered a heavy defeat in Frankfurt 5-1, and the logical theme of the evening in Germany is - how long will it take Niko Kovac on the bench of the Bavarians? A Croatian expert has been suffering criticism and blows for weeks, and a debacle against Eintracht will only increase that pressure. "The match ended exactly as we didn't want. You can't lose 5-1 here, not even ten players. I'm disappointed. We did too much We lost a bunch of balls that we didn't return. These are all easy mistakes that were immediately punished, "commented the match from the corner of Nick Kovac.
Coach Bayern says his team has been in a difficult position since the beginning. "It's not easy when you play with ten 80 minutes in Frankfurt. That's not something we expected. And surely we didn't play well in the second half. The red card was a detail that he decided, but we didn't play well either, "Kovac emphasizes.
He was enraged by the press, what were the reasons for the defeat? "I don't have to share everything with you. What do you want to hear from me? We started well and got a red card."
In the end, they asked him about the future on the Bayern bench, and he himself confirmed that she was uncertain. "I don't know anything about it. You (the press) probably know better than I do. How can I know anything minutes after the game? opinion is irrelevant. You need to ask decision makers, "Niko Kovac concluded.
